      IResource convert(String key, IResource source)
      Returns the cache file for the specified key.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.jaggr.core.cache.IGenericCache

        clear, contains, dump, getKeys, newInstance, setAggregator, size

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        IResource convert(String key,
                IResource source)
                  throws IOException
        Returns the cache file for the specified key. If the cache file does not exist, then a new cache file is created by calling the resource converter that was provided in the constructor for this cache instance with the specified source resource.
        Parameters:
        key - the cache key
        source - the resource to be converted (may be null). If null, the result will be non-null only if the cache entry already exists.
        Returns:
        the cached resource object, or null if source is null and the cache entry does not already exist.
        Throws:
        IOException
